events.message: We have received your application for the Senior Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your profile has been successfully categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application and will reach out soon to discuss next steps.
The initial screening has been completed, and your technical skills align well with our requirements.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-08 at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
You successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback from the engineering panel.
The HR interview is scheduled for 2024-05-12 at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
You have successfully completed the HR interview. The feedback was favorable and next steps will follow.
We have sent you an official job offer via email. Please review it carefully and respond at your earliest convenience.
We received your positive feedback regarding the offer and are glad to hear that you are enthusiastic about joining.
You have officially accepted the offer. We are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process is underway. You will receive all necessary information and support to begin your role.
The hiring process is now closed with your successful integration into the team as a new software engineer.
